action_item: Workflow - Show the workflow of receiving client referrals and using the system.
notes: Demonstrate the process from receiving referrals via email, fax, or shared spreadsheet.

action_item: Data Migration - Share the spreadsheet with client referrals while ensuring PHI is protected.
notes: Hide patient identifiers and share the spreadsheet for review.

action_item: Requirements - Confirm the requirements for reporting and data extraction from NextGen.
notes: Discuss the need for improved reporting capabilities and gather specific requirements.

action_item: Users & Roles - Clarify the roles of admins and clinical staff in the workflow.
notes: Ensure everyone understands their responsibilities in the patient management process.

action_item: DrFirst/EPCS - Discuss the integration of immunization tracking in the new system.
notes: Ensure immunization inventory tracking is included in the system requirements.

action_item: Reports - Collect and specify reporting requirements for case management and outcomes.
notes: Compile a list of desired reports and outcomes for review.

action_item: Appointment Types - Walk through the immunization case process in the new system.
notes: Demonstrate the steps involved in documenting immunizations.
